description: This meta shows you how to create a subaccount on rave.

spec.account_bank: This is the sub-accounts bank ISO code, use the List of Banks for Transfer endpoint to retrieve a list of bank codes.
spec.account_number: This is the customer's account number.
spec.business_name: This is the sub-account business name.
spec.business_email: This is the sub-account business email
spec.business_contact: This is the contact person for the sub-account e.g. Richard Hendrix
spec.country: This is the ISO country code of the merchant e.g. NG, GH, KE etc.
spec.split_type: This can be set as percentage or flat when set as percentage
spec.split_value: This can be a percentage value or flat value depending on what was set on split_type

meta.meta_name: This allows you pass extra information (key) about the sub-account.
meta.meta_value: This allows you pass extra information (value) about the sub-account.
